verses.text: And it came to pass in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \add that\add* \w Rezin|strong="H7526"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, and \w Pekah|strong="H6492"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* toward \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w* against it, but \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w prevail|strong="H3898"\w* against it.

And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* is \w confederate|strong="H5117"\w* with \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*. And his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* was \w moved|strong="H5128"\w*, and the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, as the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w wood|strong="H3293"\w* are \w moved|strong="H5128"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*.\f + \fr 7.2 \ft is confederate…: Heb. resteth on\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, Go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* now to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w*, thou, and \w Shear-jashub|strong="H7610"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, at the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w conduit|strong="H8585"\w* of the \w upper|strong="H5945"\w* \w pool|strong="H1295"\w* in the \w highway|strong="H4546"\w* of the \w fuller’s|strong="H3526"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*;\f + \fr 7.3 \ft Shear-jashub: that is, The remnant shall return\f*\f + \fr 7.3 \ft highway: or, causeway\f*

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w*, and be \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*; \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, neither be \w fainthearted|strong="H7401"\w* for the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tails|strong="H2180"\w* of these \w smoking|strong="H6226"\w* \w firebrands|strong="H0181"\w*, for the \w fierce|strong="H2750"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of \w Rezin|strong="H7526"\w* with \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, and of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w*.\f + \fr 7.4 \ft neither…: Heb. let not thy heart be tender\f*

Because \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w*, have taken \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* against thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Let us go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w vex|strong="H6973"\w* it, and let us make a \w breach|strong="H1234"\w* therein for us, and \w set|strong="H4427"\w* a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of it, \add even\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Tabeal|strong="H2870"\w*:\f + \fr 7.6 \ft vex: or, waken\f*
\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, It shall not \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*, neither shall it come to pass.

For the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \add is\add* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, and the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* \add is\add* \w Rezin|strong="H7526"\w*; and within \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* shall \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* be \w broken|strong="H2865"\w*, that it be not a \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 7.8 \ft that…: Heb. from a people\f*

And the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add is\add* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \add is\add* \w Remaliah’s|strong="H7425"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. If ye will not \w believe|strong="H0539"\w*, surely ye shall not be \w established|strong="H0539"\w*.\f + \fr 7.9 \ft If…: or, Do ye not believe? it is because ye are not stable\f*

¶ Moreover the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* unto \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,\f + \fr 7.10 \ft Moreover…: Heb. And the \+nd LORD\+nd* added to speak\f*

\w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* thee a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* it either in the \w depth|strong="H6009"\w*, or in the \w height|strong="H1361"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*.\f + \fr 7.11 \ft ask it…: or, make thy petition deep\f*
But \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will not \w ask|strong="H7592"\w*, neither will I \w tempt|strong="H5254"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye now, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; \add Is it\add* a small \w thing|strong="H4592"\w* for you to \w weary|strong="H3811"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, but will ye \w weary|strong="H3811"\w* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* also?

Therefore the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* himself shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w*; Behold, a \w virgin|strong="H5959"\w* shall \w conceive|strong="H2030"\w*, and \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Immanuel|strong="H6005"\w*.\f + \fr 7.14 \ft shall call: or, thou, O virgin, shalt call\f*

\w Butter|strong="H2529"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* shall he \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, that he may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* to \w refuse|strong="H3988"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

For before the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* to \w refuse|strong="H3988"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* that thou \w abhorrest|strong="H6973"\w* shall \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* of \w both|strong="H8147"\w* her \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*.

¶ The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon thee, and upon thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and upon thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that have not \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, from the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; \add even\add* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w* for the \w fly|strong="H2070"\w* that \add is\add* in the uttermost \w part|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and for the \w bee|strong="H1682"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

And they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and shall \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* all of them in the \w desolate|strong="H1327"\w* \w valleys|strong="H5158"\w*, and in the \w holes|strong="H5357"\w* of the \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*, and upon all \w thorns|strong="H5285"\w*, and upon all \w bushes|strong="H5097"\w*.\f + \fr 7.19 \ft bushes: or, commendable trees\f*

In the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* with a \w razor|strong="H8593"\w* that is \w hired|strong="H7917"\w*, \add namely\add*, by them \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, by the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and the \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* of the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*: and it shall also \w consume|strong="H5595"\w* the \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*.

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w nourish|strong="H2421"\w* a \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w cow|strong="H5697"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*;

And it shall come to pass, for the \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* of \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \add that\add* they shall \w give|strong="H6213"\w* he shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w butter|strong="H2529"\w*: for \w butter|strong="H2529"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* shall every one \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* that is \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 7.22 \ft the land: Heb. the midst of the land\f*

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* every \w place|strong="H4725"\w* shall be, where there were a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w vines|strong="H1612"\w* at a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w silverlings|strong="H3701"\w*, it shall \add even\add* be for \w briers|strong="H8068"\w* and \w thorns|strong="H7898"\w*.

With \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* and with \w bows|strong="H7198"\w* shall \add men\add* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* thither; because all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall become \w briers|strong="H8068"\w* and \w thorns|strong="H7898"\w*.

And \add on\add* all \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* that shall be \w digged|strong="H5737"\w* with the \w mattock|strong="H4576"\w*, there shall not come \w thither|strong="H0935"\w* the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of \w briers|strong="H8068"\w* and \w thorns|strong="H7898"\w*: but it shall be for the sending \w forth|strong="H4916"\w* of \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w*, and for the \w treading|strong="H4823"\w* of lesser \w cattle|strong="H7716"\w*.
